data.text:
Etimag began its journey in 1978 when one young passionate engineer, Mehmet H. Okur, started a family business manufacturing packaging machines in a small workshop in Istanbul, Turkey. In the following years, the success of his thriving business as well as his drive and vision led Mr. Okur to expand and found Etimag. Today, as a second generation family-owned company, we are one of the leading shrink sleeve & label producers in Turkey. We are a collaboration of like-minded young and progressive people with a passion for what we do. Our priority is to use our design and production pedigree in order to make your p roduct stand out in crowd of competition. Thanks to our wealth of experience in not only shrink sleeve and label printing and production but also in the manufacture of state-of - the-art packaging machines, we can tailor-make any SOLUTION to suit your design ideas, however unconventional they may appear at first. At Etimag, we strive not only to produce high quality labels for your product, but to work together to help you GET THE BEST VALUE OUT OF YOUR BRAND.

Website

http://www.etimag.com.tr
